readable.title: 2501968935_02f2cd8079
readable.content: A man dressed in a purple shirt and red bandanna smiles at the people watching him . A man on the street wearing leather chaps and a chainmail codpiece . A man wearing a purple shirt and black leather chaps poses for the camera . Man dressed in leather chaps and purple shirt stands in front of onlookers There is a man in a purple shirt , leather chaps and a red bandanna , standing near other men .
